text: 11.51: Stt 4.8; 2 Sto 24.20-21Mbe fhum Aber shogim, ana vɨzɨn siasuagi tugen kegap zav, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nzuav shama mbui artar gum Fhe Bakɨme Phena kɨtɨgar Sekaraia shogim, ana vɨzɨn siasuagi tuge thɨgi. Mbe mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi shogim, mbe vhɨzgi gumgi. Ahaŋ, gu guigira nde nzuai, nde ntige ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde vhɨra, nde mben kurav, mba gumgir mbogir kivav, pheni ga muuŋgi. Nde ne suaŋv ndera mben simtɨga ndirga.
